titleStmt.title: J. R. Hold to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG6437

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Ashland Boyd Co Ky
May 16th/65
Gov Bramlette
Honorable sir

there is a fine assessed against me again in the boyd Circuit Court amounting to $50,00 & cost which I am not able to pay without suffering my family I pray you for gods sake to remit the fine If you wish to know aything about me Enquire of Dr Suddarth Surg in Charde of your Hosptl I belonged to Co L 1st Regt C G I have never been Discharged as yet the rest of the boys is left agin to the Us service

your Obt Servt
J R Hold

If you remit the fine Direct to Col L T Moore
Catlets burg Ky
Dear Gov Please forward an answer soon as it will have to be paid the first of next month

Boyd Cir Ct
vs
John R. Hold
$50.
selling liquor to minors
Remitted
14th June/65
